question: Which of the following was a reason because of which the French could not succeed in India in the 18th century?
option1: They sided with the weak Indian sides such as Chanda Sahib and Muzaffar Jang
option2: Dupleix was called back at a crucial time
option3: They conspired against the Indian powers
option4: Their trading company was heavily dependent on the French Government
answer: Their trading company was heavily dependent on the French Government
explanation: Jean-Baptiste Colbert, founded the French East India Company in 1664 with the intention of rivaling the success of the English and the Dutch in India.Their trading company was heavily dependent on the French government.
